website_summaries.verdict: A premium drain cleaner that cuts through standing water to remove clogs.
pros: Works great on metal pipes, garbage disposals, and septic systems
Specially formulated to quickly address clogs
Starts working in 7 minutes or less
Drain cleaner instructions are easy to follow
cons: Sometimes fails to eliminate hair clogs
May require multiple applications to achieve desired results

customer_reviews.title: Temporary fix as clogs come back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clear my bathtub, but I find it getting clogged every 2-3 weeks. Which means I have to use Drano two times a month. This stuff works temporarily. I bought the plastic decloggers to snake down the drain myself to pull out anything I could and found half melted hair. What this Drano does is just attempted to chemically melt everything it touches in the pipes, but doesn't really do the job 100%. Eventually, it just builds back up and makes you keep buying and using the product. It's just a temporary fix and not a permanent one.
customer_reviews.author: Stigma

customer_reviews.title: Never Works
customer_reviews.text: I wasted 4 bottles of this stuff on my sink drain. Didn't work at all, by the end of the day the clog went from a slow drain to completely blocked up. Put some in a cup to test. 24 hours later the hair and gunk in the cup was hardly affected.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslinger

customer_reviews.title: Fixed what a plumber could not
customer_reviews.text: Fixed what my boyfriend and plumber couldn't!! 🙏🏻🙏🏻 Our dishwasher was backing up into the sink and the sink would not drain!! After having a plumber cut into the main line and clear it out, it still wasn't fixed. One bottle of this did the trick! Used the second one just for an added touch and the thrill of watching it actually go DOWN the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. I did as one reviewer said and used ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I did as one reviewer said and used about a quarter of the bottle, let it sit for half an hour, then flushed with hot water. I gave it a bit, then did another quarter bottle and let it sit overnight. Flushed it in the morning and now I don’t have standing water in my shower every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time
customer_reviews.text: I poured 160 fluid ounces down my bath room sink ,it did drain better but not by much.I finally pulled the 1 grey pipe off the sink and the 2 smaller white pipes and cleaned them by hand with a brush..to give the drano some credit the stuff in the pipes was a gooey mess. I will not waste my time on drano again. Now that I pulled the 3 pipes off and cleaned them by hand ,the sink flows awsome
customer_reviews.author: woof

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Was having some serious issues with two bathroom sinks and a bottle of this cleared it right up. The second sick was a bit more stubborn, so had to hit it twice, but the stuff that came out with a quick plunge looked like it had been caked onto those pipes for years. I doubt the people that lived here before me ever treated their drains. After using this treatment, though, I have not had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald C. Mcconway Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well in bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: I followed the direction on the bottle and used 1/2 the bottle. The sink drained water almost immediately. However, the next time I used the sink the water backed up again. I used the other half and pf course the water drained quickly but, the next time I used it (1/2 bottle) the sink drained quickly but then the next time I used it, I went through through another 1/2 bottle. The clearing of the sink and using a 1/2 bottle each time is not economically feasable.
customer_reviews.author: Ps2os2

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I try to use chemical free options around the house when I can, but I tried everything I could and nothing was working. My bathtub/shower combo was draining really slowly. Every day I showered the tub would fill about 4” and take about 20 min when I was done to drain. It would leave a soap scum ring around the tub because of the slow ring that I had to clean daily. After all the all natural options, I tried a snake and even Liquid Plumber still nothing was working. I was just about to call a plumber and my sister said to try this. I did and goodness did this work. Finally I can shower without worry!
customer_reviews.author: A regular shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I have used this twice on partial clogs in the bathroom sink due to hair I suspect. These are big bottles. They are bigger than I expected and come in sets of two. I pour almost half a bottle into the sink, put on a big pot of water to boil, and then as soon as it boils vigerously (about 20 mins) pour down the sink. By the time the water makes its way down the clog is fully taken care of. Run more water down to rinse and its as good as new. Cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money Down the Drain!
customer_reviews.text: This used to work for me. It used to declog my sink, but it's not that powerful at all at doing so. I pour the whole bottle down my sink since the direction said to pour more on extremely-low running drain after half the bottle didn't work the first time, but it still didn't do anything to it at all. I ended up pouring both bottles down the drain and my sink is still clogged. Money down the drain! I guess if your sink isn't too slow-running then it may work, but sadly, it didn't work for me. Easy to use 5/5 ***** Value 5/5 ***** Presentation 5/5 ***** Functionality 3/5 *** My Recommendation 3/5 ***
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: The subscribe and save option saves a lot of money if you don't mind waiting. The price for the two of these is pretty close to the price of one from other sellers. Oh, and these work. I'd recommend boiling a bit of water as it can help give the hot water from your tap a bit of a boost after you've waited the thirty minutes. After you've let a bunch of water go through so you can't get any blowback you can plunge which may bust through a partial clog weakened by the drano. Make sure you wait and let the water drain for a bit because drano splashing back is no fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tyr Na Nog

customer_reviews.title: Made the issue worse
customer_reviews.text: After two attempts to accurately follow instructions, our kitchen sync got blocked completely. Previously it'd drain eventually after a day or two and after this nonsense it's got sealed permanently. When snaking it to properly unblock the drain, some of this gunk ended up on socks and jeans completely running it in the process. Seems like the content of the bottle is concentrated bleach with similar efficiency on cleaning drains and 10 times the price. Avoid if you care about your drains and clothing. Now I wish I'd believed to other 1 start ratings before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: but this worked fine and was a good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well to unclog a slow drain in my laundromat. The clog culprit was most likely hair or lint from clothes. The sodium hydroxide in this product eats through that stuff effectively. There are stronger products on the market that are for industrial applications, but this worked fine and was a good value. We used both bottles completely on a 3" drain pipe. Initially, no results, but after 3 applications and about a half hour, the drain was noticeably faster, maybe 100% free.
customer_reviews.author: GregHouTx

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it on kitchen sink, bathtub, bathroom sink. All worked. I usually let the water drain (sometimes it takes hours but in my cases it always drained), add 1/5 bottle per instruction, let it sit for half an hour or till it all went in. In the mean while I boil 2 or 3 pots of water. When the time is up, pour the water in and let it drain. Occasionally I need to repeat the process one more time. So far it all worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Top of bottle was open!  TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: Mistakes happen - I get it. So the first time the Drano top was open, I forgave it. This is now my second order and now a second time this has happened - the top to the Drano was open and spilled everywhere. So I basically got 1.5 bottles instead of 2. The box was completely destroyed and Drano poured all over the floor in my building lobby. The security guard and staff maintenance had to be called to clean it up - and, of course, it has such a potent scent - I was incredibly embarrassed. Be warned - this is the second time this has happened to me - and it will definitely be my last.
customer_reviews.author: AEZ

customer_reviews.title: it worked pretty well. The reason its getting 4 instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clear my clogged sink drain, it worked pretty well. The reason its getting 4 instead of 5 is I had to use one of the entire bottles to clear the clog - I followed the directions the first time and I used 1/5th of the bottle and didn't get any better drainage from the sink, poored in the rest of the bottle and 15 mins later the slow clog was gone and the sink drained quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dudeman

customer_reviews.title: Flush it
customer_reviews.text: Here is a pro tip. Put water in a large pot and set to medium heat on your stovetop AFTER pouring this product in your drain. When it finally starts to boil, take the large pot of boiling water and pour it into the treated drain. Using the empty pot, turn on the hot spigot and catch the unheated water with the large pot while the boiled water is still draining. Once the water is running hot, remove the pot and let the hot water flush the drain. Basically the idea is, add the product to the drain..... Let it sit a while, then flush flush flush with HOT HOT water. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: 00charger

customer_reviews.title: Clears my sink
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the drain cleaners, Dranol is the one that I've personally had the most success with. Dranol clears my sink, my bathtub, and my toilet with ease. I've tried others that don't work on all, or sometimes even any of my appliances. However, I'm well aware that different cleaners may clean different materials better or worse, but for now, Dranol is what works for me, so I'll continue to use it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pangtience

customer_reviews.title: preventing dirty water from going the drain while showering
customer_reviews.text: My roommate and I both have extremely long hair. This equals constant drain cloggage, preventing dirty water from going the drain while showering. Very annoying. With this economy (re: JUMBO) bottle, we can clear the drain to our heart's content once every month or two. Works extremely well and effects can be seen upon the subsequent shower (aka I'm not shampooing while simultaneously feeling like I'm standing in a dirty puddle) . Great price point, too. Bottle should last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dentist_chickTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: NOT working for hair removal
customer_reviews.text: DONT recommend if you are trying this to remove the hair in the sink, because for me, it is not working at all. The only reason why I bought this is due to the review on Amazon is so good, HOWEVER, it’s NOT working for my bathroom sink. I followed the direction, but my sink was still stuck and water went down very very slow. The final solution is to broke my sink stopper, and grabbed hairs stuck in sink with my hand. That’s totally working. So if you try to get rid of hair, don’t put a lot hope on this
customer_reviews.author: KLzhuang

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the bottle had a clear line along side ...
customer_reviews.text: By the time I was done showering I was standing in water up to my ankle. Using vinegar and baking soda didn't work. Niagara falls has nothing on the speed with which water goes down the drain after using this clog remover. It would be nice if the bottle had a clear line along side with measurements. In the instructions it said to pour 1/5 of the bottle in the drain, which you'd have to eyeball. The product itself works great. I used about 3/5 to get rid of the clog. Chase is it with boiling water after letting it sit for about 30 minutes and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I use this exactly as directed and it works. Used to pay the plumber to "snake" at $50 a visit. Was afraid that the drain cleaner products would corrode the pipes. Then the manufacturer came up with this product (guaranteed not to damage pipes) and have been using it since. With our family's thick, curly hair, lots of stuff accumulates quite naturally, soap scum, etc. , even with the strainer over the drain. I use it as needed. Very effective in unclogging and gets things draining fast again.
customer_reviews.author: Fran K.

customer_reviews.title: Works a little, but not much.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for a few years for a slow bathtub drain. It has worked less and less. After three applications in one day the tub still backed up and took 2-1/2 minutes to empty. I looked on youtube and saw a video on how to clear a sluggish tub drain by removing the drain and the hair clog beneath it. Took about 5 minutes to do. Pulled out a golf ball sized accumulation of soapy hair. Put the drain back in. Tub now empties in less than 15 seconds. No more Draino. No more slow emptying tub.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: GUESS WHEN?
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS THE PRODUCT - IT DOESN'T CHANGE NO MATTER WHO YOU BUY IT FROM. SO THE REAL QUESTION IS HOW QUICKLY CAN YOU GET IT AND DO THEY DELIVER WHEN THEY SAY THEY WILL? NOW THE DELIVERY DATE WAS UNREASONABLE AND ALMOST MADE ME LOOK SOMEWHERE ELSE - EBAY IS ALWAYS QUICKER AND MORE CHOICES AT LOWER PRICES. BUT I JUST THOUGHT "WELL I CAN REALLY WAIT UNTIL IT COMES" AND SO I WAITED UNTIL THEY ADVISED ME IT WAS GOING TO TAKE LONGER. AND THEN IT TOOK LONGER THAN THAT.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as expected
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why the previous reviews say it’s effective but it doesn’t work well to unclog my shower room drain. The first time I poured about 1/4 and didn’t fully use hot water because we need to wait a minute for hot water to kick in. It’s not effective at all. The second time I poured all the rest of the bottle in, waited about 1 hour and use all hot water. It has some effects. Water won’t go up to my ankle but still cumulating if showing time is a little bit long...I am disappointed. I am gonna give a third try, let it sit for a whole day before washing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Two!
customer_reviews.text: I think this works pretty good, but I’ve used other Drano products that are stronger. However, this being a two pack is what sold me because it’s a good value for the price of two as I will use more than one bottle of this particular Drano product to get desired results. Had this been the cost for one bottle, I wouldn’t have purchased it, but two bottles gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: 4 bottles later my kitchen is unclogged
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen sink was so clogged I should have called a plumber for sure. Plunging, pouring boiling water and salt, for over 2 weeks and it remained severely clogged, draining only after 8 hours or more. Poured 4 bottles of this **** down the drain over the course of a week and then poured boiling water down after it by the gallon. The drain finally **** itself and everything was back to normal. I don't recommend anyone do what I did. Just get plumber. Living for weeks without a kitchen sink is rough.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cheese

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: We ended up renting a house with a stand up shower which is super nice, but the water was filling up so fast and it would stay in the shower for hours. Got this based off a friend’s recommendation and it was the best decision I made. There wasn’t too bad of a smell while pouring, though it did get a little strong after being in the pipes for 30 minutes. After we used this, there were absolutely no issues with water backing up etc. it’s been a week since we bought this, and still no sign of having to use this again anytime soon. 5 stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: mickeycd

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on clogged bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.text: I had a clogged bathroom sink and I poured the recommended amount down about three times and followed it up with boiling water and it unclogged my bathroom drain. I am very relieved that this did its job because I was worried I was going to have to repair it by calling in a third party. Luckily this took care of whatever was clogging it. The major thing I could think of being clogged in my bathroom sink would most likely be hair. So I can definitely recommend this to anyone with a similar problem. I still have about 1/4 of the first bottle and an entire full bottle still from the twin pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders; very effective and easy to use. It does stink up the bathroom just a bit so I suggest you turn your fans on beforehand and leave them on for a while and if you’re like me and have small children at home, might be a good idea to do this when they’re not home or take them out for the day after pouring this product down the drain. Worked on all of our bathroom sinks and bathtubs.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been skeptical of Drano. I finally decided to give it a try...it works!! I bought it due to my tub draining slow. When I showered, the water would almost cover my feet before draining. I didn't do any additional to my drain. I used the Drano, as directed. It says let sit for 15-30 minutes then flush with hot water. I let it sit maybe for about 45 minutes or so. I flushed with the hot water for maybe a minute or two. A few hours later I showered and the water continued to drain, as expected! I'm glad I gave it a chance rather than pay for a plumber!
customer_reviews.author: QueenTee

customer_reviews.title: works amazing
customer_reviews.text: we had a tub that was full of water, the drain was completely clogged. we first thought it was the bad plumbing because we had just started renting and it was an old house. i dumped some of this in and waited half hour or so and the tub was empty! followed with hot water and repeated just to be sure it got the whole clog out and it’s drained perfect ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: LEAKING Removed paint on my step. Go to store buy
customer_reviews.text: OMG just got this put it on my step in the garage, it has a leak and it removed the paint on my step in less than 15 min. thank goodness it was garage. Not sure how I return a leaky drain cleaner. Go to store and buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: Worth having it.
customer_reviews.text: Was having some significant issues with two restroom sinks and a restrain of this cleared it right. The subsequent wiped out was more difficult, so needed to hit it twice, yet the stuff that came out with a fast dive seemed as though it had been solidified onto those lines for quite a long time. I question the individuals that lived here before me at any point treated their channels.
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY This does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not work. I've used both bottle in the same week and saw not changes in my tub. This was even after I prepped the drain by using a snake to get any hair that that might be caught (i.e. less to dissolve or clear). This stuff poured smooth, but it did nothing. I'm going to use the Green stuff that others have been talking about. What a disappointment and waste of money this Max Gel turned out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jee. O. Lobo.

customer_reviews.title: The Drano Max Gel got my tub drain back to draining like new! I got a spiraling vortex of water ...
customer_reviews.text: Get the Max Gel! The Dual Force Foamer Drano stuff did nothing for my "slow moving drain". The Drano Max Gel got my tub drain back to draining like new! I got a spiraling vortex of water at the drain after I just left the Max Gel in there for about an hour. I left the Dual Force Foamer over night and even did it twice....nothing. Used the Max Gel ONCE and awesome results!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Alternatives
customer_reviews.text: This was not the first clog removal order I've bought, but it's certainly the last brand I'll ever try. After trial and error in my apartment's bathroom sink, not only did this one finally do the job, but it did so with 1/5 of 1 of the 2 bottles that I've bought for the same amount as other failing brands. I don't regularly write reviews, but this product finally allowed me to stop buying and trying and failing with other drain clog removals. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: YourAvgCollegeStudent

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I've had drain problems for a long time, and cleaning out the main sewer pipe has been necessary. Usually, drain cleaners don't do the trick. I poured this down the bathtub drain following directions, and let it sit for a half hour. Flushed it with hot tap water (I like to use a bucket so there's a lot of water pressure) and it has been flowing better than it has in years. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mory

customer_reviews.title: Unplugo Your Drano
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, I can't say that I have any complaints about this product at all. Shipping was super fast even in these troubling times. Will order again if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Upston

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hair and food clogs
customer_reviews.text: Do you have two roommates who shed hair daily in the shower and like to pour soup down the kitchen sink weekly? Then you need this Drano! This Drano formula reliably cuts through all our apartment's hair and food clogs once we notice that our sinks and shower are backing up. If you follow the directions on the back of the bottle, Drano will take your sink from a murky swamp to a free flowing waterfall in 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: RobPlease

customer_reviews.title: Actually made drain worse...
customer_reviews.text: Followed the step by step instructions to the T and repeated the steps a second time. Not only did this not help the clog, but it went from draining slowly to not draining at all. We ended up having to use a plunger to clear the drain (even though the safety instructions said not to) just to get the drain back to where it was before. Happily enough, the plunger actually cleared the drain completely! So my suggestion would be - stick to a plunger instead. Oh, and another note - we couldn't even return the product because it isn't eligible for a return due to it containing flammable liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to product for unclogging my tub! It’s easy to use and so effective. You literally pour it in, wait for about 15 minutes and no more clog. Sometimes, I need to add more and go for additional minutes but it does the job and couldn’t be happier. I don’t trust any other product but this one.
customer_reviews.author: AbbyWabby

customer_reviews.title: I have to use a little more, but....
customer_reviews.text: I have to use a little more than they recommend to clear out my drains, but I also live with two large dogs, two cats, and one very hairy man. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Use it to prevent clogs
customer_reviews.text: I use it regularly to prevent clogs in kitchen sink. However, this is not meant to solve the problem once it’s clogged. There are times when the sink is clogged and drano doesn’t work. You may get lucky if it works to resolve a minor clog, but I suggest to use it periodically to prevent clogs.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Works similar to a Lyzol toilet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remove clogs in my kitchen sink. Instruction said use and follow with Boiling water. I can see that some of the dirt residue on the sink top is getting removed and I assume similar action is removing any build up in the pipes. It smells like Lyzol drain liquid as well. Works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Siva Karthikeyan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a plumber and EXCELLENT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom sink and shower always get clogged up thanks to my thick curly hair. Calling a plumber cost too much money. Drano to the rescue. Worked well and the price is FANTASTIC!!!! In the store I would have paid MORE for one bottle. With this deal I got an extra bottle for next time that I know I will use. Shipping was fast and I had no issues. Thank you for such a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Trish C

customer_reviews.title: Effective against hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this on hair clogs in my bathroom sink. It works very well on both human hair and cat hair. It works quickly too--30 minutes is usually enough. I've had success applying much less gel than recommended on the bottle. This 2-pack might last a year for me.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It does not work..
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instruction from step to step but I feel that it did not remove the clog in the kitchen at all. I thought it might not work in the kitchen sink and pour the rest in the bathtub but it still didn't work... For the bathtub maybe try the plastic stick that can pull your hair out, works much better than this gel.
customer_reviews.author: Yoloya

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand sold here that is supposed to be less toxic. It didn't work (I used 2 bottles of the other product). I didn't use the full bottle of this one yet it worked just fine. I let it sit for 8 hours then used very hot water at first to help flush my bath tub. It worked.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Top flew off
customer_reviews.text: I love this deal, but the top was not secured! I plopped it down (not very hard mind you) and the top popped off and squirted all over the place, and on my skirt. It's ruined, the draino ate the dye and fibers. I spent a pretty penny on that skirt. Also got on a jacket, but that seems ok. It's dangerous, what if it squirted in my eye or someone else's? Beware and be careful while handling this, and I hope the manufacturer fixes this. Hopefully it's just a defect in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had problem with my kitchen sink it was draining very slowly. I used another product from some other company and that blocked the drain completely. I had ordered "Drano Max Gel Liquid Clog Remover" earlier and luckily it arrived the same day. I poured a small amount in the kitchen sink drain and left it for 30 minutes and then drained it with hot water it completely cleared the sink drain
customer_reviews.author: Zaf

customer_reviews.title: Value pack!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked amazing! It unclogs drains that have been reduced to a "barely" draining to free flowing with little to no effort. I've also use this stuff to get tough hair clogs in the bathtub out and it works great highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S.Y

customer_reviews.title: Drain Clog-b-Gone
customer_reviews.text: We have very old pipes in our home that are constantly clogging. This works in every drain in the whole house. Standing showers, tubs, sinks, and toilets. I have never found anything that worked this well and it mostly works all on its own.
customer_reviews.author: MrsWhite

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT labeled for septic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from a review site for specifically septic systems. It was rated # among 5 septic products. When I received it, I noticed the label doesn't even mention septic systems! Deceptive review site, advertising, seller, whatever, I won't use any of them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Drains have been clogged for a while and poured this down following with hot water and fixed the problem right away. Was surprised when this came in the mail that it was a twin pack. Very happy with it, did its job and now I have a whole extra container as back up. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C Quin

customer_reviews.title: it did not clear the clog but rather made it 100% worse somehow. Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this product multiple times and it never successfully unclogs my drain. In fact, the last time I used it on my bathroom sink, it did not clear the clog but rather made it 100% worse somehow. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Baker

customer_reviews.title: Helps Us
customer_reviews.text: We live in a rental which is connected to septic. The lines are a mess. They tend to back up often. Draino usually does the trick. Let word here being usually. On regular clogs this probably would work fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: By CJs Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Clog Got Worse After Use
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened, but after using this product (as directed) the slow running drain I had became completely clogged. No idea what happened, or if this product is the cause, but now I have a fully clogged drain and need to call a plumber. I don't think I would use it again until I understood what happened with my drain.
customer_reviews.author: Rob L.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I used it on the bathtub drain 3 times and it hasn't worked at all. It says it works on hair clogs and apparently that's not true. I bought one specifically for hair clogs once and it was amazing but they don't sell it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Deezy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: It took Several applications to get rid of a standing water clog in the shower but it worked and haven’t had another clog since. No nasty smell and the fact that it doesn’t harm septic system is very important. Have bought a couple more bottles just incase. Very fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: MrsGriz

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells terrible -- and works exactly like you'd expect Drano to work. You don't buy it because it smells good or because you're wanting to nurture Mother Nature. You buy this stuff because you've tried everything else and you just need some tough chemicals to bust through the clog in your drain -- which this will do. I can't say it's good for the earth, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Works 100%, Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure, when I bought it because I read some people saying it doesn't work after they use 1 or 2 full of it then I watched on youtube a guy compairing cleaners in lab and based on him, Drano is the best (you can find the video too on yt). Now, I tried it and all I can say is the money worth it. I didn't even use full of it. I put a cup of it and waited around 45 minutes and checked if it works. I really recommend people to try it, trust me you don't regret it. Maybe, it depends what clogged your bathtub, but for me 100% worked.
customer_reviews.author: Natnael Feleke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our bathroom sinks and shower drain were so clogged they were backing up this nasty black mess. Ordered this in desperation. When it arrived opened it used it per direction. Within the allotted time all drains were clear
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Used Full Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product worked, but not at the recommended dosage. I followed the directions exactly, but it didn't clear. I dumped the whole bottle, and it did! I would imagine that it's not good for your pipes, so we have invested in a hair catcher to avoid this issue reoccurring. All in all, pleased with the product for working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unclogs mild drain jobs
customer_reviews.text: This is the stuff you use for those clogged drains due to dirt, grime, and hair. Especially made for standing water situations, which I have used on a couple of occasions. I use about 1/8-1/4 of the bottle at a time. If it doesn't unclog your drain in 10 minutes, I would probably be worried that you need to have it physically unclogged.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: It does its job to an extent
customer_reviews.text: It clwared up my drain so i may shower again. But theres still visible water in drain that i don't want to get backed up again so i will not becable to use the 🚿. But it drains after using 2 bottles of this.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and was worried about the amount needed since the drain was taking a while to glug-glug-glug it down all the way. But I came back and followed the instructions to wash down with hot water (it takes a while for it to get hot so it was really lukewarm/slightly warm water) and then I didn't have to shower in my own dirt puddle! It even left the area around the drain whiter than the rest of my tub.... Only issue is that my bathroom was tiny and I was a bit worried about the fumes. Just don't be an idiot and close the door and trap yourself in the fumes and you'll be fine
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: It did the job for our kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.text: It did the job for our kitchen sink. Had to do it twice so half the jug each time. Been a few weeks now and no problems. The second jug from the two pack is for 'backup'. Will use it in the upstairs bathroom sink... Where the ladies brush their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It works!  (Well enough to hold off a visit from a plumber!
customer_reviews.text: The product works well....as stated (holding off the expense of a real plumber for a while)....but the wonderful part of the experience was just opening up the front door & bringing the (super heavy) box inside!!! Not having to pay for the delivery/not having to go to the store/not having to lug those 2 heavy jugs from the store to the car then into the house.....& it was substantially cheaper buying it from Amazon. I’m livin’ the dream!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maier

customer_reviews.title: Only solution that works before calling a plumber
customer_reviews.text: Tried everything out there. This is the only thing that worked to clear my bathroom sink. My wife has long hair and it always clogs the sink. This cleared it after one treatment. Liquid plumber and the green alternative did not.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Easy and It Works.
customer_reviews.text: We had a slow drain in the house we built 5 years ago (I know!). Purchased a "Natural" product which was expensive and after repetitive attempt it just didn't work. After all that frustration, this product worked like a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: B. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Unclogged my shower drain . Such a relief I was so tired of standing in 3 inches of water 🚿. I had to do two treatments on the drain but it is now in working order 🤗 and I still have an extra bottle definitely a good value
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Works !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is good. Had a mostly clogged drain in the bathroom sink. Poored this magic gel in, left it for 30 mins. Came back to CLEAN unclogged sink! Ran some hot water through it and haven't looked back since. Great deal on the stuff. Beats local store prices.
customer_reviews.author: Alli D

customer_reviews.title: stuff just plain works, just follow direction carefully
customer_reviews.text: I have a stubborn bathroom sink drain that clogs up and runs very slow every once in a while and this stuff really cleans it out. Then I go ahead and start putting enzymes down that drain to try to keep it cleared this usually works for about 6 months and have to repeat it again
customer_reviews.author: THXkid61

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, but need some patience
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. Previously we doubted about the result. Once we used up two bottles into our built up clogged sink by two over nights, the water starts running thru the pipe as expected. Highly recommended, but need some patience.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Does a so-so job. We have a slow drain in one of our showers. I followed the directions and although it did not completely fix the issue, it is better. It's not a complete fail so I give it a three star.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t worth the money. Followed the instructions and even waited overnight. Still doesn’t work. update: used a whole bottle trying to solve the slow drain sink in the bathroom. doesn't work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: but it worked liked a charm
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but it worked liked a charm! Granted I don't think this would clear a major blockage, but if your wife's hair is potentially the culprit, use this bad boy and you will be amazed. I am going to use it periodically for maintenance, just to keep up on things.
customer_reviews.author: Gorm

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly good
customer_reviews.text: I've tried nearly every brand of drain opener there is, and this one works fairly good. However, if you have a really old house, like I do, it may not work as well as you expected.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best drain clearing liquid on the market
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Pros: + works like a charm + very easy instructions + the safety cap is sturdy so there is not concern of young children getting a hold of the liquid. Cons: None that I can think of!
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Great product. Safe on plastic and metal.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Great product. I usually use a half a bottle when I see my sink is a bit sluggish. I don't like to wait until my sink gets backed up & becomes a stubborn problem. A half bottle every 3 months works great as a preventive for my sink. Safe on plastic and metal too.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: I have just easy case when water flushes not as expected and this stuff do not work at all. I've tried to leave it more than needed and tried to spend half of bottle at once but still same. no effect.
customer_reviews.author: Vladislav Goncharenko

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn't work. My kitchen sink got clogged so I poured half a bottle down the drain. 4 day later my sink is still clogged and my apartment has a strong odor of bleach.
customer_reviews.author: merritt

customer_reviews.title: Both of these used with zero results
customer_reviews.text: Used both of these on all drains , but particularly on my washer drain . Didn't remove the blockage like other products has done for me in the past . Quite disappointed , so many good reviews on this as well .
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Liquid Plumber yet Drano Max Gel Liquid is my new go to for clogged drains. I poor down clogged drain and leave for one-hour then brew water in coffee pot and flush down drain. This works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: takes a lot to be effective
customer_reviews.text: it takes a lot to actually clear the shower drain. and im still not convinced that its really cleared because it comes back again in a few weeks, and im a fellow with short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure. It broke the clog, but the sink is still sluggish. No clog=great, but should I expect it to have gotten more gunk off the sides? Or should I get some foam or something to finish cleaning it up? I'll have a look around and see what's out there for sluggish drains. Meanwhile, since clog went byebye, it gets a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: 🌈 KT

customer_reviews.title: Maybe need to consult a professional??
customer_reviews.text: So I have had trouble with my bathtub drain for quite awhile. To preface this let’s just say I have very long curly hair and I brush my hair in the shower. I have honestly tried everything at this point. I tried draining hair remover clogger and now i used the entire bottle to unclog this drain. Needless to say it didn’t work. Perhaps it’s time to consult a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for a must have
customer_reviews.text: Drano is must if you live with indoor plumbing....and have hair....that ends up down your drains....especially long hair. Follow the instructions. Pour. Let sit for the allotted time. Then pour very hot water into the drain. Works almost every time
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Feagins

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for my bathroom sink. Just followed the instruction on the bottle, it fixed the blog issue of the sink and saved the money to pay for a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Unclogs my sinks and bathtubs in minutes. Super easy to use. Doesn’t smell harsh either. I use it once or twice a month to keep my drains clear.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hern

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Started with 1/5 bottle poured in as instructed, didn’t notice any difference, 2/5 still nothing. But when half of the bottle’s in, boom, the clog is gone! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The product description is misleading
customer_reviews.text: The product description is not clear, it makes me though that it's suitable for all usage including kitchen sink because it mentions garbage disposal. It turns out look like only can dissolve hair after I ordered and see its useless then checking again every detail of the full page. So it doesn't help my kitchen. In the description, it should list what it can dissolve instead of saying "Bloackages" and "tough clogs"
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen The Vinh

customer_reviews.title: Works Fast
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely gets the job done. I had a clogged up bathroom sink so I ordered this and it really worked. i put some in sink and tried running water 10 minutes later and it did its job. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.V

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for hair in sink drain
customer_reviews.text: Ended up using an entire bottle trying to clear a sink drain of hair. No results. Flushed it with boiling hot water after use, but no use. If your sink is clogged with hair, purchase an auger instead and it'll be clear within minutes. This stuff is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Godlike
customer_reviews.text: I was pessimistic this product would solve my slow draining shower after I used a snake to pull some hair out and that didn't work. IT FIXED MY DRAIN. I don't know what kind of sorcery is in this bottle but well worth the price. No plumber required. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Drummer52895

customer_reviews.title: Worked but needed a lot of liquid
customer_reviews.text: It eventually worked after using both large bottles. I've used other products for our tricky drain that worked with 1/4 to 1/3 of a smaller container.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this stuff. I just shake well then pour it down the drain (followed instructions on bottle). It unclogged my shower after 45 mins. I did use it twice because the water looked like it could be draining faster and that did the trick. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: #LovetoShop

customer_reviews.title: 🙅‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: I used it two times to unclog our bathroom ,sink the day I bought it.not sure if our pipe need to be replaced because the clog is so bad or this product over sells itself on what it can do.
customer_reviews.author: huaguangli

customer_reviews.title: Unclogged drains!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works and is quick! Just follow the instructions. I’d recommend using a tool to clean out hair and junk if you can before using.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

product_meta.title: Drano Max Gel Drain Clog Remover and Cleaner for Shower or Sink Drains, Unclogs and Removes Hair, Soap Scum, Blockages, 80 oz- Pack of 2
product_meta.description: Drano Ultra Max Gel pours through standing water and works fast (7 minutes or less) to clear clogged drains and restore them to a free-flowing state. Safe for all pipes, it works great to remove hair, soap scum and other gunky clogs.
feature_bullets: Formulated thick to dissolve the tough clogs fast
Cuts through standing water straight to the clog
Safe on PVC, metal pipes, garbage disposals and septic systems
More than just a hair clog remover - guaranteed to work or your money back
Removes and cleans clogs in all bathtubs, showers, and sinks

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
